title: Getting leaverbusted due to computer crash
body:
All my Asian nerd classmates finally convinced me to play league. However, I am thinking of quitting because randomly during the games, my FPS will drop and then my computer will shut off with no warning. The computer takes forever to startup, and when I join, I get a leaverbuster penalty. I have not been able to finish a 20+ minute game without the computer dying.

Do you have any tips?

replies.body: Oooooo if your pc is randomly shutting off in the middle of games there's a decent chance that it might actually be overheating. Double check for any fans that might not be working or need some cleaning and there's a couple other points you can try on [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#mq7).
